in response to vinci1

There is a software defect with the game that causes crashing. feezeing and lag on certain system setups including almost All ATI graphics cards and many windows vista/7 OS's that use quad core or better proccessors.
There is a patch availible to remedy this but unfortunately no one with crack the patch and just keep releasing old torrents with the patch and old crack with obviously does not work. If you really Wanna play this game I recomend you just buy it because It is going to be a hassle constantly having to update and then wait for new cracks and torrents.

I have ATI 5750 and game is working fine!

Fix 1-ATI CARD USERS
Quote: 1- open game from saboteur.exe
2- Alt Ctrl delete Go to ur task manager under the processes Tab find Saboteur.exe
3-Right Click on it and select set priority and change it to Real Time
4- Right Click again on saboteur.exe and choose Set affinity and mark CPU1 only ... For quad core Mark cpu3 only
5- go back to game should be fixed . Fix 2-NVIDIA AND ATI USERS

Quote: 1- go to my documentMygamesThe Saboteur Save game Congif.txt
2- find the refresh rate and make it 60
3- find vysinc and change it to 0
4-write this line under the vysinc line Windowed 1 without the quotes
5- FileSave ... FileExit
6- Run Game it should work Fix 3-NVIDIA USERS
